name: Marimba & Simon Says
description:
The marimba & simon says is a memory game that combines the classic simon says game with the musical instrument, marimba.

Features:
19 keys (1.5 Octaves)
High quality real marimba sounds

Free Play Mode:
Multi touch / multi slide keyboard
Musical note names on each key

Game Mode:
Repeat the sequence of notes for as long as you can. Challenge your memory skill and have fun.

For more music learning materials and information, please visit us at http://piano-music-theory.com
